name: Overscore
body:
Overscore ========= Overscore builds underscore.js templates on the server side for you, and outputs a javascript you can include in the browser. It even supports AMD output. $ overscore --help Usage: overscore [options] Options: -h, --help output usage information -V, --version output the version number -s, --silent Shortcut for --loglevel silent. -a, --amd Wrap output with define to make it AMD compatible. -n, --namespace Namespace under which templates should live. [Templates] -l, --loglevel Minimum log level to display. [info] -b, --basedir Base directory to keep out of namespacing. Usage ----- $ npm install -g overscore $ overscore -n Templates -b example example/**/*.html > templates.js ### templates.js ```javascript /* * Safely grab the namespace(s). */ var Templates = Templates != null ? Templates : {}; /* * Individual templates. */ Templates.Dashboard.base = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+=' '+( "Hello, world." )+' ';}return __p;}; Templates.Dashboard.item = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+='
';}return __p;}; Templates.Dashboard.stats = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+=''; if (done) { ;__p+=' Clear '+( done )+' completed '+( done == 1 ? 'item' : 'items' )+' '; } ;__p+='
'+( remaining )+' '+( remaining == 1 ? 'item' : 'items' )+' left
';}return __p;}; Templates.Profile.admin.base = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+=' '+( "Hello, world." )+' ';}return __p;}; Templates.Profile.admin.item = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+='
';}return __p;}; Templates.Profile.admin.stats = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+=''; if (done) { ;__p+=' Clear '+( done )+' completed '+( done == 1 ? 'item' : 'items' )+' '; } ;__p+='
'+( remaining )+' '+( remaining == 1 ? 'item' : 'items' )+' left
';}return __p;}; Templates.Profile.user.base = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+=' '+( "Hello, world." )+' ';}return __p;}; Templates.Profile.user.item = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+='
';}return __p;}; Templates.Profile.user.stats = function(obj){var __p='';var print=function(){__p+=Array.prototype.join.call(arguments, '')};with(obj||{}){__p+=''; if (done) { ;__p+=' Clear '+( done )+' completed '+( done == 1 ? 'item' : 'items' )+' '; } ;__p+='
'+( remaining )+' '+( remaining == 1 ? 'item' : 'items' )+' left
';}return __p;}; ```
tagline: Underscore.js templates compiled on the server-side.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
